name: Clockmancer
description:
The level is a prototype for mechanics.

Controls:

Left/Right Arrows= Move
Z= Time magic Shoot
X= Jump
A= Pause/Change time magic
S= Self time magic

F= Fullscreen
1/2/3/4/5= Custom resolution from 160x144
